trend_summary: Between earliest and latest scenes, built-up footprint grows slowly, concentrated around the southeastern town and along main road corridors. Agricultural mosaic persists but several fields convert to forest or pasture, boosting vegetation cover. Infrastructure upgrades and a new industrial enclave appear, yet overall landscape stays largely rural with sparse settlement.
notable_changes: Incremental residential infill around the main southeastern settlement.
Emergence of a small industrial/warehouse complex near the southern road junction.
Widening and straightening of the north-south arterial road corridor.
Conversion of some cropland patches to greener pasture or woodland, increasing vegetation cover.
Minor expansion of scattered hamlets along secondary roads.
